{{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=Start | |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |British-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject London|importance=mid|class=start}} {{WikiProject Women's History|class=start}} }} {{dyktalk|11 June|2004|entry=...that residents of the [[old soldiers' home]] known as [[Royal Hospital Chelsea]] are called '''[[Chelsea pensioner]]s'''?}} == Ceremony Image from the home page == On the home page of Chelsea pensioner's is this [http://chelsea-pensioners.co.uk/upload-images/BAE%20Picture%202.jpg ceremony image] available, thought it could be added to the article, by giving credit to the [http://chelsea-pensioners.co.uk Royal Hospital Chelsea]. --[[User:Xeryus|xeryus]] ([[User talk:Xeryus|talk]]) 22:53, 5 June 2008 (UTC) == how many live there etc? == needs work - hopeless article doesn't give even the basics == Residential care?== It would 'tell the whole story' if it could be mentioned how far the care of Chelsea Hospital goes. I note that it is a requirement for in-pensioners to be capable of looking after themselves to be resident. What happens if the pensioner becomes incapable (commonly known as 'senile') and in need of residential/social care? Does the hospital provide within its walls or does the person have to go elsewhere?[[User:Cloptonson|Cloptonson]] ([[User talk:Cloptonson|talk]]) 19:11, 25 October 2014 (UTC) == Requested move 13 November 2016 ==

[[User:Cuchullain|Cúchullain]] [[User talk:Cuchullain|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/Cuchullain|c]] 14:32, 21 November 2016 (UTC) ---- [[:Chelsea pensioner]] → {{no redirect|Chelsea Pensioner}} – They are called '''Chelsea Pensioners''' here in the UK which is the proper name. They are referred to as 'Chelsea Pensioners' across Wikipedia and throughout the article itself - everywhere except in the title. The name needs to be capitalised to be correct. The title should not be allowed to stand just because the article's starter made an error [[User:Jack1956|Jack1956]] ([[User talk:Jack1956|talk]]) 23:44, 13 November 2016 (UTC) *Quite correct. The article needs to be moved to Chelsea Pensioner. [[Special:Contributions/86.171.159.202|86.171.159.202]] ([[User talk:86.171.159.202|talk]]) 00:01, 14 November 2016 (UTC) *'''Support''' clearly a proper noun.
